target.name: help
target.echo: get-the-classics (or gtc) : getting the classics configuration
phing-launcher.self-update : self update the Phing Launcher script.
composer.update : updates the project dependencies with Composer. + see the composer.install description.

composer.install : installs the project dependencies with Composer. + optionals parameters: [composer.parameters] : add some parameters to the command (default: "") [composer.directory] : run the command in a specific directory (default: .) + example : ./phing.sh composer.install -Dcomposer.parameters="--no-dev --no-scripts"
phpunit.run : run the PHPUnit tests (for Continuous Integration).
phpunit.run.no-dependency : run the PHPUnit tests without installing all the dependencies.
